Package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.util

package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.util
Generic utilities developed at the Australian National University Research School of Computer Science.
  • date / time class
  • manipulation of number ranges
  • String manipulation
  • generation of unique identifiers
  • file manipulation utilities

A lot of this code is probably redundant with existing libraries by now, but at the time of development of this package they were not.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 19 mai 2021
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    DateTime
    A date-time format.
    ExceptionString
    Static method to handle exceptions.
    ExecutionResults
    A class to store the result of an external command execution, for use in applications that launch processes on a local or remote host.
    FileUtilities
    Utilities to manipulate files independent of OS.
    IntegerRange
    A class to represent ranges of integer numbers.
    JavaUtils
    Utilities to handle java specific files, e.g.
    NumberRange
    Static methods to format number ranges as Strings.
    Resources
    Utilities to locate resources (usually text files) in the project class hierarchy.
    StringUtils
    Static methods to manipulate strings
    Uid
    Guaranteed universally unique identifers.
